summary:
Training Wheels Off - Unleashing CLM with LTIPP on Arbitrum - Celebrating the full launch of Beefy's CLM products with 12 weeks of LTIPP incentives on Arbitrum.

 Quarterly Report Q1 2024 - Dive into the first quarter of 2024, another stellar quarter for Beefy DAO.

 Empowering Growth: Mode, the OP Stack L2 - Introducing Beefy’s 27th blockchain - Mode - a chain built from the ground up to incentivize innovation.

 Cowcentrated Liquidity: A New Era of Yield Optimization - Introducing the newest suite of automated liquidity solutions: Beefy CLM.
